items.sentence: Can you think of anyone who might be able to babysit our kids tonight?
Do you really think Tom can convince Mary to go to the dance with him?
Do you really think that Tom is the best French speaker in your class?
Tom usually lets dirty dishes pile up for a week, then he washes them.
Tom wanted to be the first to shake hands with Mary after her concert.
I want to believe there\'s still a chance for us to be happy together.
After a long high-speed chase, the police officer shot and killed Tom.
As Tom and Mary approached the station, they saw their train pull out.
Kids wake up early in the morning to open their presents on Christmas.
Mary often hums songs under her breath while she works in the kitchen.
